General.Name: Hoang Huy Investment Services JSC
General.Description: Hoang Huy Investment Services Joint Stock Company manufactures and imports medium and heavy-duty trucks under the DONGFENG brand name in Vietnam. The company offers tractors, dump trucks, concrete nixing trucks, and specialized vehicles, as well as repair and maintenance warranty services . It also invests in real estate projects. Hoang Huy Investment Services Joint Stock Company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hai Phong, Vietnam.
